originalText.text: Dr. Sherwin Parikh has treated me for over twenty years. During this time I’ve watched him grow and develop his practice to become a benchmark standard for the industry. He is trustworthy, kind, competent, efficient, and, most importantly, he gets results! Everywhere I go people compliment my skin. Dr. Parikh has enhanced my overall health, medically and aesthetically. This is an extremely talented doctor. I recommend him...highly.

text.text: Dr. Sherwin Parikh has treated me for over twenty years. During this time I’ve watched him grow and develop his practice to become a benchmark standard for the industry. He is trustworthy, kind, competent, efficient, and, most importantly, he gets results! Everywhere I go people compliment my skin. Dr. Parikh has enhanced my overall health, medically and aesthetically. This is an extremely talented doctor. I recommend him...highly.

originalText.text: I  feel like I am in great hands. Dr. Parikh fully understands the special needs and different type of care darker pigmented skin requires. I've followed his regimen for skin care products and mild laser treatments. Some of the products he recommends are low cost drug store items. The correct products and care makes such a difference. I am finally clearing up my hyper-pigmentation issues and feel more confident wearing less make up. I am very happy to have found Dr. Parikh!

originalText.text:
People always compliment me about my skin, after today's treatment ...  Hydro Facial with Roweena at The Tribeca Skin Center, the admiration will flow even more. Wow, what a difference this treatment makes. She is a professional and her skin is outstanding. When I arrived, I felt like a 100 years old, when I left, went back to my 30s. I'm not in my 30s. This treatment is refreshing and addictive. I will be back for more and more.

In addition, Dr. Parikh has been my doctor for over 20 years, all the way back when he was a resident. I will follow him and his team anywhere. I highly recommend their services as well. Dr. Leo & Dr. Kil are also top notch. Your skin will thank you. Book an appointment, today!

originalText.text: Dr.Parikh is so amazing. He offers a wealth of knowledge. He's treated my traction alopecia as well as mild acne- the product he recommended smoothed my complexion overnight. I could go on for hours but 5/5 stars, 10/10 would recommend to a friend.

text.text: Dr.Parikh is so amazing. He offers a wealth of knowledge. He's treated my traction alopecia as well as mild acne- the product he recommended smoothed my complexion overnight. I could go on for hours but 5/5 stars, 10/10 would recommend to a friend.

originalText.text: Tribeca Skin Center is by far my favorite doctor's office.  I was having an unknown skin reaction on a Friday.  They allowed me to make an appointment on a Friday afternoon at 5:30 for a 5:45 appointment.  Dr Parikh was very patient, knowledgeable, and took the time to understand my reaction and thoroughly explain my symptoms and the cause of my symptoms.  He even requested that I email the office in a week just to make sure I was symptom free and on the mend. My skin improved within just a few days. I recommend Tribeca Skin Center and Dr. Parikh to all my friends!
